verses.verse: And all the congregation <WH5712> lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> their voice <WH6963>, and cried <WH5414> <WH8799>; and the people <WH5971> wept <WH1058> <WH8799> that night <WH3915>.

And all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> murmured <WH3885> <WH8735> against Mosheh <WH4872> and against Aharon <WH175>: and the whole congregation <WH5712> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Would 'Elohim <WH3863> that we had died <WH4191> <WH8804> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> ! or would 'Elohim <WH3863> we had died <WH4191> <WH8804> in this wilderness <WH4057> !

And wherefore hath the YY <WH3068> brought <WH935> <WH8688> us unto this land <WH776>, to fall <WH5307> <WH8800> by the sword <WH2719>, that our wives <WH802> and our children <WH2945> should be a prey <WH957>? were it not better <WH2896> for us to return <WH7725> <WH8800> into Egypt <WH4714> ?
And they said <WH559> <WH8799> one <WH376> to another <WH251>, Let us make <WH5414> <WH8799> a captain <WH7218>, and let us return <WH7725> <WH8799> into Egypt <WH4714>.

Then Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> fell <WH5307> <WH8799> on their faces <WH6440> before <WH6440> all the assembly <WH6951> of the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312>, which were of them that searched <WH8446> <WH8802> the land <WH776>, rent <WH7167> <WH8804> their clothes <WH899>:

And they spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto all the company <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The land <WH776>, which we passed <WH5674> <WH8804> through to search <WH8446> <WH8800> it, is an exceeding <WH3966> <WH3966> good <WH2896> land <WH776>.

If the YY <WH3068> delight <WH2654> <WH8804> in us, then he will bring <WH935> <WH8689> us into this land <WH776>, and give <WH5414> <WH8804> it us; a land <WH776> which floweth <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

Only rebel <WH4775> <WH8799> not ye against the YY <WH3068>, neither fear <WH3372> <WH8799> ye the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>; for they are bread <WH3899> for us: their defence <WH6738> is departed <WH5493> <WH8804> from them, and the YY <WH3068> is with us: fear <WH3372> <WH8799> them not.

But all the congregation <WH5712> bade <WH559> <WH8799> stone <WH7275> <WH8800> them with stones <WH68>. And the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> <WH8738> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> before all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, How long will this people <WH5971> provoke <WH5006> <WH8762> me? and how long will it be ere <WH3808> they believe <WH539> <WH8686> me, for all the signs <WH226> which I have shewed <WH6213> <WH8804> among <WH7130> them?

I will smite <WH5221> <WH8686> them with the pestilence <WH1698>, and disinherit <WH3423> <WH8686> them, and will make <WH6213> <WH8799> of thee a greater <WH1419> nation <WH1471> and mightier <WH6099> than they.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, Then the Egyptians <WH4714> shall hear <WH8085> <WH8804> it, (for thou broughtest up <WH5927> <WH8689> this people <WH5971> in thy might <WH3581> from among <WH7130> them;)

And they will tell <WH559> <WH8804> it to the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of this land <WH776>: for they have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> that thou YY <WH3068> art among <WH7130> this people <WH5971>, that thou YY <WH3068> art seen <WH7200> <WH8738> face <WH5869> to face <WH5869>, and that thy cloud <WH6051> standeth <WH5975> <WH8802> over them, and that thou goest <WH1980> <WH8802> before <WH6440> them, by day time <WH3119> in a pillar <WH5982> of a cloud <WH6051>, and in a pillar <WH5982> of fire <WH784> by night <WH3915>.

Now if thou shalt kill <WH4191> <WH8689> all this people <WH5971> as one <WH259> man <WH376>, then the nations <WH1471> which have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the fame <WH8088> of thee will speak <WH559> <WH8804>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Because the YY <WH3068> was not <WH1115> able <WH3201> <WH8800> to bring <WH935> <WH8687> this people <WH5971> into the land <WH776> which he sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto them, therefore he hath slain <WH7819> <WH8799> them in the wilderness <WH4057>.
And now, I beseech thee, let the power <WH3581> of my YY <WH136> be great <WH1431> <WH8799>, according <WH834> as thou hast spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

The YY <WH3068> is longsuffering <WH750> <WH639>, and of great <WH7227> mercy <WH2617>, forgiving <WH5375> <WH8802> iniquity <WH5771> and transgression <WH6588>, and by no means <WH5352> <WH8763> clearing <WH5352> <WH8762> the guilty, visiting <WH6485> <WH8802> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon the children <WH1121> unto the third <WH8029> and fourth <WH7256> generation.

Pardon <WH5545> <WH8798>, I beseech thee, the iniquity <WH5771> of this people <WH5971> according unto the greatness <WH1433> of thy mercy <WH2617>, and as thou hast forgiven <WH5375> <WH8804> this people <WH5971>, from Egypt <WH4714> even until now <WH2008>.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799>, I have pardoned <WH5545> <WH8804> according to thy word <WH1697>:
But as truly <WH199> as I live <WH2416>, all the earth <WH776> shall be filled <WH4390> <WH8735> with the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068>.

Because all those men <WH582> which have seen <WH7200> <WH8802> my glory <WH3519>, and my miracles <WH226>, which I did <WH6213> <WH8804> in Egypt <WH4714> and in the wilderness <WH4057>, and have tempted <WH5254> <WH8762> <WH853> me now these ten <WH6235> times <WH6471>, and have not hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> to my voice <WH6963>;

Surely they shall not <WH518> see <WH7200> <WH8799> the land <WH776> which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto their fathers <WH1>, neither shall any of them that provoked <WH5006> <WH8764> me see <WH7200> <WH8799> it:

But my servant <WH5650> Kalev <WH3612>, because <WH6118> he had another <WH312> spirit <WH7307> with him, and hath followed <WH310> me fully <WH4390> <WH8762>, him will I bring <WH935> <WH8689> into the land <WH776> whereinto he went <WH935> <WH8804>; and his seed <WH2233> shall possess <WH3423> <WH8686> it.

(Now the Amalekites <WH6003> and the Kanahanites <WH3669> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in the valley <WH6010>.) To morrow <WH4279> turn <WH6437> <WH8798> you, and get <WH5265> <WH8798> you into the wilderness <WH4057> by the way <WH1870> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872> and unto Aharon <WH175>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

How long shall I bear with this evil <WH7451> congregation <WH5712>, which murmur <WH3885> <WH8688> against me? I have heard <WH8085> <WH8804> the murmurings <WH8519> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which they murmur <WH3885> <WH8688> against me.

Say <WH559> <WH8798> unto them, As truly as <WH3808> I live <WH2416>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, as ye have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> in mine ears <WH241>, so will I do <WH6213> <WH8799> to you:

Your carcases <WH6297> shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> in this wilderness <WH4057>; and all that were numbered <WH6485> <WH8803> of you, according to your whole number <WH4557>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, which have murmured <WH3885> <WH8689> against me,

Doubtless ye shall not <WH518> come <WH935> <WH8799> into the land <WH776>, concerning which I sware <WH3027> <WH5375> <WH8804> to make you dwell <WH7931> <WH8763> therein, save Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312>, and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>.

But your little ones <WH2945>, which ye said <WH559> <WH8804> should be a prey <WH957>, them will I bring in <WH935> <WH8689>, and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> the land <WH776> which ye have despised <WH3988> <WH8804>.
But as for you, your carcases <WH6297>, they shall fall <WH5307> <WH8799> in this wilderness <WH4057>.

And your children <WH1121> shall wander <WH7462> <WH8802> in the wilderness <WH4057> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>, and bear <WH5375> <WH8804> your whoredoms <WH2184>, until your carcases <WH6297> be wasted <WH8552> <WH8800> in the wilderness <WH4057>.

After the number <WH4557> of the days <WH3117> in which ye searched <WH8446> <WH8804> the land <WH776>, even forty <WH705> days <WH3117>, each day <WH3117> for a year <WH8141> <WH3117> <WH8141>, shall ye bear <WH5375> <WH8799> your iniquities <WH5771>, even forty <WH705> years <WH8141>, and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> my breach of promise <WH8569>.

I the YY <WH3068> have said <WH1696> <WH8765>, I will surely <WH518> <WH3808> do <WH6213> <WH8799> it <WH2063> unto all this evil <WH7451> congregation <WH5712>, that are gathered together <WH3259> <WH8737> against me: in this wilderness <WH4057> they shall be consumed <WH8552> <WH8735>, and there they shall die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

And the men <WH582>, which Mosheh <WH4872> sent <WH7971> <WH8804> to search <WH8446> <WH8800> the land <WH776>, who returned <WH7725> <WH8799>, and made all the congregation <WH5712> to murmur <WH3885> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH3885> <WH8735> against him, by bringing up <WH3318> <WH8687> a slander <WH1681> upon the land <WH776>,

Havahn those <WH582> men <WH582> that did bring up <WH3318> <WH8688> the evil <WH7451> report <WH1681> upon the land <WH776>, died <WH4191> <WH8799> by the plague <WH4046> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.

But Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312>, which were of the men <WH1992> <WH582> that went <WH1980> <WH8802> to search <WH8446> <WH8800> the land <WH776>, lived <WH2421> <WH8804> still.
And Mosheh <WH4872> told <WH1696> <WH8762> these sayings <WH1697> unto all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and the people <WH5971> mourned <WH56> <WH8691> greatly <WH3966>.

And they rose up early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>, and gat them up <WH5927> <WH8799> into the top <WH7218> of the mountain <WH2022>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Lo <WH2009>, we be here, and will go up <WH5927> <WH8804> unto the place <WH4725> which the YY <WH3068> hath promised <WH559> <WH8804>: for we have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Wherefore now do ye transgress <WH5674> <WH8802> the Mitzvah <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068>? but it shall not prosper <WH6743> <WH8799>.
Go not up <WH5927> <WH8799>, for the YY <WH3068> is not among <WH7130> you; that ye be not smitten <WH5062> <WH8735> before <WH6440> your enemies <WH341> <WH8802>.

For the Amalekites <WH6003> and the Kanahanites <WH3669> are there before <WH6440> you, and ye shall fall <WH5307> <WH8804> by the sword <WH2719>: because ye are turned <WH7725> <WH8804> away <WH310> from the YY <WH3068>, therefore the YY <WH3068> will not be with you.

But they presumed <WH6075> <WH8686> to go up <WH5927> <WH8800> unto the hill <WH2022> top <WH7218>: nevertheless the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068>, and Mosheh <WH4872>, departed <WH4185> <WH8804> not out <WH7130> of the camp <WH4264>.

Then the Amalekites <WH6003> came down <WH3381> <WH8799>, and the Kanahanites <WH3669> which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in that hill <WH2022>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them, and discomfited <WH3807> <WH8686> them, even unto Hormah <WH2767>.
